page.title: 12HEALTH AROUND TYWARDREATH
page.content: If you were ill you would probably have to book an appointment at{Par {Health Centre}(just down the road from Tywardreath). There they have a{group {practice}of three doctors. There is a surgery in the morning and evening on five days of the week. Besides seeing people who are ill they also do{ {preventative medicine,}like taking the blood pressure of men over 35 and immunizing children. If you cannot get to the surgery a doctor will see you at home. The three doctors also work at the{cottage hospital at Fowey}which is about 5 miles away. The doctors can perform small operations there and older people can go there if they need care after having an operation. It is a very small hospital, only 16 beds, but it is very good and we are glad it is there.
